title: Cognitive Apprenticeship-Based Project Learning for Advancing Economic Mental Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic economics theories and familiarity with mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments using digital devices, with economics modeling projects linked to real-world cases.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately construct causal relationship diagrams explaining economic phenomena.
Learners can apply at least three economic models (e.g., supply-demand, game theory) to practical tasks per project.
Learners can utilize metacognitive strategies to diagnose and plan corrections for errors in their economic models.
Teams can complete a final economic analysis project and present it to industry professionals.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
